case_title: Atta Ullah Jogezai vs Chief Secretary Government of Balochistan Quetta and others
respondents: Chief Secretary Government of Balochistan Quetta

relief_sought: Declare the notification as illegal and void
Allow appellant to perform duties as Managing Director, GIEDA

facts.initial_appointment: Principal BPS-17 Labour Department Labour Education Wing (2002)
promotions: Director Workers Welfare Board Labour Department BPS-19
facts.transfer_notification: Directed to report Secretary Labour and Manpower Department (02-04-2023)

appellant.seniority_claim: Appellant is a senior officer of BPS-19 compared to Respondent No. 5 (BPS-18)
appellant.service_excellence: Streamlined GIEDA operations and infrastructure development

respondents.legal_basis: S.10 of the Balochistan Service Tribunals Act, 1974 and S.4 of the Balochistan Civil Servants Act, 1974
respondents.transfer_policy: Transfer/posting is at the discretion of the Government
respondents.eligibility_claim: Respondent No. 5 is a regular officer of BPS-19

tribunal_findings.eligibility_issue: Post of Managing Director GIEDA requires BPS-20; both appellant and Respondent No. 5 are BPS-19
tribunal_findings.term_completion: Appellant served two terms (4 years) as Managing Director
tribunal_findings.violation_of_principles: Posting of junior officers against senior posts violates Supreme Court judgments and administrative circulars

decision.directive: Government of Balochistan to appoint an eligible officer of BPS-20 as Managing Director GIEDA within 15 days
